1. The app will be hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud till Attraction 2018 till 28th Feb 2018 \n 2. The app will be migrated to internal Attra servers post Attraction 2018\n 3. Mobile numbers and Attra email ids of the employees installing this app, will be stored on AWS for sending updates and generic org wide messages till 28th Feb 2018\n 4. Pictures taken by Attra employees through this app, will be stored in the AWS cloud for the entire duration of apps being available i.e., till 28th Feb 2018\n 5. Mobile numbers, email ids and the pictures will NOT be used for any purposes apart from the org wide updates if any, through the app.\n 6. Employee\'s mobile numbers will be retained to send generic org wise updates and for newer features of the app. This communication mode will continue till he/she is an Attra employee\n 7. The terms and conditions will be updated, for the app with additional features and usage post Attraction 2018\n 8. On acceptance of these terms and conditions, Attra will not be liable for any personal data misuse
Attraction 2018 is an Attra in-house built application by Digital Practice team, L & D Team and with inputs from Corporate Strategy.\nIt reinstates our focused direction towards \'Attra 3.0 journey\' and thus first time our own in-house customized mobile application has been launched.\nThe application was made within a quick turnaround of approximately only two weeks.\n\nWe will appreciate your feedbacks on this application. Please reach out to mobility@attra.com.au in case of your feedbacks and suggestions.
